actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide for the elimination of the General Services Administration's Federal Building Fund.

summary.text: Federal Building Crisis Act - Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to eliminate the General Services Administration's Federal Buildings Fund. Provides for the liquidation of monies in such Fund before and after the enactment of this Act with specified exceptions.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the elimination of the General Services Administration's Federal Building Fund.
